nodes.text: During Yaru Korsin's reign as Grand Lord of the Lost Tribe of Sith on Kesh, this Keshiri was a vocal and prominent dissenter from the commonly accepted idea that the Sith were divine. As a means to reassure the faith of the Keshiri people, the dissenter was brought out to preach in the Circle Eternal plaza of the city of Tahv, only to die, seemingly choking to death on his own words.
